258.bodyText: The construction of Nexus Tower is coming along brilliantly, but we need more bricks to finish the job! See Nexus Jay in Nimbus Station to find out how you can help!

259.bodyText: As a Rank 2 Inventor, you may now be strong enough to head to Forbidden Valley. The Ninjas there have been struggling to keep the Maelstrom at bay!

260.bodyText: So you're a Rank 2 Adventurer now, eh? You might be ready to take on the shadowy horrors lurkin’ deep in Forbidden Valley. And I ain’t just talkin’ about them Ninjas!

261.bodyText: The Ninjas of Forbidden Valley have been battling against deadly Maelstrom enemies. As a Rank 2 Space Ranger, you now have the skills and power to help their cause!

262.bodyText: Paradox maintains a strong presence in Forbidden Valley. Now that you are a Rank 2 Shinobi, you should visit our Ninja brethren there and learn from them.

263.bodyText: I hear you've acquired an entire set of Rank 2 Specialty Kit gear! Head to Nexus Tower to purchase your Rank 3 pieces from Nikolai Gammapulse, your Faction Vendor!

264.bodyText: I hear you've acquired an entire set of Rank 2 Specialty Kit gear! Head to Nexus Tower to purchase your Rank 3 pieces from Nikolai Gammapulse, your Faction Vendor!

265.bodyText: Heard yer all outfitted with a full set of Rank 2 Specialty Kit gear! Set sail for Nexus Tower and purchase your Rank 3 pieces from Billy Ganges, your Faction Vendor!

266.bodyText: Heard yer all outfitted with a full set of Rank 2 Specialty Kit gear! Set sail for Nexus Tower and purchase your Rank 3 pieces from Billy Ganges, your Faction Vendor!

267.bodyText: I hear you've acquired an entire set of Rank 2 Specialty Kit gear! You can purchase your Rank 3 pieces from Torbert Oscillator, your Faction Vendor here in Nexus Tower!

268.bodyText: I hear you've acquired an entire set of Rank 2 Specialty Kit gear! You can purchase your Rank 3 pieces from Torbert Oscillator, your Faction Vendor here in Nexus Tower!

269.bodyText: My agents tell me you've acquired an entire set of Rank 2 Specialty Kit gear! Head to Nexus Tower to purchase your Rank 3 pieces from Sutoro Hatto, your Faction Vendor.

270.bodyText: My agents tell me you've acquired an entire set of Rank 2 Specialty Kit gear! Head to Nexus Tower to purchase your Rank 3 pieces from Sutoro Hatto, your Faction Vendor.

275.bodyText: Agent, now that you have helped the other Faction leaders, I have an important mission for you. Please come see me in the Paradox Laboratory so that we may speak.

276.bodyText: Greetings! I'm glad you have been able to help the other Faction leaders. I have a new task for you to complete. Please talk to me in the Nexus Core.

278.bodyText: I have an urgent mission for you to carry out on Crux Prime. Report back to me in the Sentinel Command Center for a briefing.

279.bodyText: Hey there me bucko, got a bit of a mishap back at the Tower what needs sortin' out. Now that yer done helpin' them other leaders, can you come back and see me?

292.bodyText: Hey Rocco! You left your Earth Spinjitzu kit back at the Monastery, so I'm sending it to you. Don't leave this lying around again - we don't want the Skeletons getting their bony hands on it!
